questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: MARY WARREN: Goody Good is pregnant!
PROCTOR: It is your poppet, is it not?
ELIZABETH: She wants me dead. I knew all week it would come to this.
HALE: You are Goodwife Proctor.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: ELIZABETH, delicately: Adultery, John.
MARY WARREN: I'll not be ordered to bed no more, Mr. Proctor!
CHEEVER: I have a warrant for your wife.
ELIZABETH: I never kept no poppets, not since I were a girl.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: Giles Corey's wife and Rebecca Nurse are in jail!
Proctor accuses Mary Warren of witchcraft!
Hale asks Proctor to name the first ten amendments in the Bill of Rights!
Proctor accuses Parris of desperately needing golden candlesticks!

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: Proctor asks if Deputy Gov. will let Osburn hang; MW says he sentenced her.
Proctor says it's OK he forgot adultery, since that's what he committed.
Liz says she couldn't've stuck the needle in the doll; she's scared of 'em.
Tituba reminds everyone she's a witch and flies off on a broom.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: CHEEVER: Why—it is a needle!
HALE: I hope you're not off to bed yet.
CHEEVER: Proctor, you dare not touch the warrant.
PROCTOR: I will curse her hotter than the oldest cinder in hell.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: CHEEVER: I find here a poppet Goody Proctor keeps.
GILES: I never said my wife were a witch; only said she were reading books!
MARY WARREN: Abby'll charge lechery on you, Mr. Proctor!
HALE: Theology is a fortress; no crack may be accounted small.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: HALE, watching MW closely: Child, you're certain this be your  memory?
GILES, shaken: John—tell me, are we lost?
HALE: But woman, you do believe there are witches—?
ELIZABETH, with great fear: I will fear nothing.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: HALE, deeply troubled: The court will send Rebecca Nurse home, I know it.
PROCTOR, to Hale: Though you be ordained in God's tears, you are a coward!
PROCTOR, counting on his fingers: Thou shalt not steal.
PROCTOR: I know the children's sickness had naught to do with witchcraft.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: When we find out Abby charged Liz with stabbing her via the poppet.
When 80-year-old Giles Corey lifts a log by himself.
When Hale tells everyone that Rebecca Nurse surely isn't a witch.
When we discover that Betty Parris was possessed after all.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: ELIZABETH: You were alone with her?
MARY WARREN: I made a gift for you today, Goody Proctor.
HALE: I hope you're not off to bed yet.
PROCTOR: There be no love for Satan in this house, Mister.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: Liz realizes John had an affair with Abby; then, John forgets adultery.
Giles Corey's wife goes to jail; then, Rebecca Nurse.
The church's Thanksgiving is cancelled due to witchcraft; then, Christmas.
After Cheever finds the needle in the poppet, Hale pulls one from his side.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: CHEEVER: I'm here to arrest Rev. Hale!
PROCTOR: That *wasn't* rabbit in the stew?!
ELIZABETH, pulling off mask: It was me, Abigail, all along!
PROCTOR: Rebecca's in the jail?!

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: Mary Warren's reaction to Elizabeth finding the poppet.
Proctor's reaction to Cheever's attempt to arrest Elizabeth.
Hale's reaction to Proctor forgetting about adultery.
Elizabeth's reaction to Proctor, generally.

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: REBECCA NURSE: Why am I in jail at all?
ELIZABETH: 'Tis Tituba ought to be hanged!
PROCTOR, to Hale: You said she were *not* charged!
HALE: Then you're *all* witches?

questions.question: Which of the options is the meme referring to?

choices.answer: "She walks out the door ... For a moment, Proctor watches from doorway."
MARY WARREN: I cannot charge murder on Abigail.
"Cheever fears Proctor, reaches inside his coat...takes out a warrant."
"Proctor striving against his disgust with Hale—and with himself."
